snippet.title: Gyakuten Saiban 2.5 - Late PromoVid for 0.53
snippet.description:
"GYAKUTEN SAIBAN 2.5 HIDDEN TRACES" IS A FAN GAME BY THE "CANAS CORP" (MAINLY "EVIL LORD CANAS"). THE USED AUDIO TRACK AND COURTROOM WALLPAPER ARTS ARE © BY THEIR RESPECTIVE OWNERS THAT I CAN'T NAME.

The next Version of our Game takes more time than we have expected. Currently we can't work on the third case because we need new location pictures, Marston can't continue writing the Script without them. This is a little promotion vid of the last year released version 0.53 that improved many optical things and fixed some spelling mistakes.

The Game is still German only, a translation can only be made when it's complete, probably next year.

Game Thread with Download Link:
http://www.multimediaxis.de/showthread.php?t=96216



IF YOU OWN SOME MATERIAL AND DON'T WANT THAT I SHOW IT, CONTACT ME PERSONALLY PER E-MAIL AND I WILL DO STEPS LIKE CHANGES IN THE VIDEO OR THE DELETION OF IT MYSELF. SORRY THIS PROGRESS CAN TAKE MULTIPLE DAYS BECAUSE I DON'T CHECK MY E-MAILS EVERY DAY. AND KEEP IN MIND THAT MAYBE OTHER VIDEOS TOO USE THE MATERIAL, IT WILL BE UNJUST TO DO IT ONLY WITH MY ONES.
